Post-Match Reflections: Michael Malone called out his team’s third quarter performance saying they got their 'a-- kicked from three'.
Malone added, 'Tomorrow we will watch a lot of film, there’s a lot to clean up, practice and try to continue to pull it out of our guys.'
Malone wants to see his team improve before opening night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Denver Nuggets fell to 0-3 on the preseason with their loss to the Phoenix Suns on Sunday night.
The Nuggets dropped their first two preseason games against the Boston Celtics in Abu Dhabi, the Nuggets fell 118-114 to Phoenix.
The Suns did not play Kevin Durant, Bradley Beal, or Devin Booker in this game.
The Nuggets have some new pieces they are integrating while also working Jokic and Murray back after their Olympic runs.
